characters.name: Ma
characters.role: Works double shifts. Leaves food outside your door. Doesn't complain.

characters.name: Ba
characters.role: Was an engineer back home. Drives a taxi here. Shows love through acts.

characters.name: Lily
characters.role: Your younger sister. Watches everything you do.

characters.name: Dev
characters.role: Best friend since 3rd grade. Also a child of immigrants.
